function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of active travel supportive infrastructure","Impact":"Increased risk of chronic and infectious diseases due to limited physical activity","Mitigation":"Design and implement active travel supportive infrastructure","Technologies":"Urban planning tools, transportation infrastructure","People":"Community members, urban planners, public health officials","Owner":"Urban planning authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Inaccurate results and inferences due to unobserved heterogeneity","Impact":"Misleading understanding of the connections between built environment and COVID-19 mortality","Mitigation":"Account for unobserved heterogeneity and its impact","Technologies":"Statistical modeling, data analysis techniques","People":"Researchers, statisticians, data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions, academic institutions"},{"Description":"Inconsistent impact of obesity and built environment on COVID-19 mortality in different countries","Impact":"Inaccurate public health policies and interventions based on localized findings","Mitigation":"Conduct cross-country studies to understand variations in impact","Technologies":"Epidemiological studies, data analysis tools","People":"Public health officials, researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"}]}
